_header: On twelfth day this star so clear
_description: James Ryman, an Epiphany carol — twelve 6-line stanzas (ababcc) including refrain, ‘This sterre that day tho went away / ffro that swete place where Ihesus lay’ and burden: ‘A sterre shone bright on xii day / Ouer þat place where Ihesus lay’

CULEe112.First Lines:
On xiithe day this sterre so clereBrought kingis iij
                    oute of the eest…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…This sterre that day tho went awayffro that swete place where
                    Ihesus lay
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.

             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 226-8.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 88-9; 1977, 78-9.
